EmailTemplate.subject: Channel Announcement: New VMTurbo 360° Partner Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, We are excited to welcome you to VMTurbo’s new 360° Partner Program, effective Monday, April 11, 2016. The new program is designed to to accelerate your path to success. There are two significant announcements you should be aware of: New and Improved Partner Portal: The new portal will be hosted within the VMTurbo Green Circle Community. On Monday, April 11, you will receive an email to activate your account. The new partner portal will feature:
- Deal Registration - Sales & Technical Training - Partner Enablement Resources - Latest Partner News
If you have any trouble logging into the new portal please contact partnersupport@vmturbo.com <[[mailto:partnersupport@vmturbo.com]]>. Partner Town Hall Meeting: Register here <[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/q2-partner-town-hall-meeting-2016?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=Channel&utm_campaign=PartnerTownHall&utm_content=04082016]]> to attend our Q2 Partner Town Hall Meeting on April 11, 2016 at 12 PM ET. We will be reviewing the following:
- In-Depth Review of the New Partner Program - Deal Registration Process - 5.5 Product Release - Q & A
Click here <[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/q2-partner-town-hall-meeting-2016?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=Channel&utm_campaign=PartnerTownHall&utm_content=04082016]]> to join our VP of Channel Marketing, Tom Murphy, as he walks you through the benefits and resources that the new partner program will offer starting on Monday, April 11, 2016 at 12 PM ET. See you on the call! Sean Sean Finnegan Director of Channel Sales
